problem_text_cn: 如图,△PBC的面积为10cm^2^,AP垂直∠B的平分线BP于P,则△ABC的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the area of ​​△PBC is N_0 ^N_1, AP is perpendicular to the bisector of ∠B and P, then the area of ​​△ABC is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,延长AP交BC于点Q,∵AP垂直∠ABC的平分线BP于P,∴AP=QP,∴S~△ABP~=S~△BQP~,S~△APC~=S~△PQC~,∴S~△ABC~=2S~阴影~=20cm^2^,故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题主要考查垂直平分线的定义及三角形的面积,由条件得出阴影部分面积为△ABC的一半是解题的关键
